name: G.A. & F.C. WAGMAN, INC., Respondent, v. MANCHESTER TOWNSHIP, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: G.A. & F.C. Wagman, Inc. v. Manchester Township

parties: G.A. & F.C. WAGMAN, INC., Respondent, v. MANCHESTER TOWNSHIP, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of July, 1987, the order of the Commonwealth Court is vacated, and this case is remanded to that court for reconsideration in light of Gilberti v. City of Pittsburgh, 511 Pa. 100, 511 A.2d 1321 (1986).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
528 A.2d 600
G.A. & F.C. WAGMAN, INC., Respondent, v. MANCHESTER TOWNSHIP, Petitioner.
No. 176 M.D. Allocatur Dkt. 1986.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 13, 1987.
